sentences.english: As far as the plot goes, we know how it's going to end.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道故事情節將怎樣結束。

sentences.english: As the Speaker said, we've got more to do.
sentences.chinese: 正如佩洛西所說的，我們還有許多事情要做。

sentences.english: Something’s not right here, I thought.
sentences.chinese: 我想事情有些不對頭的地方。

sentences.english: AMERICA'S political priorities have undergone a breathtaking about-turn.
sentences.chinese: 美國政治上優先考慮的事情已然經歷了一個大轉變。

sentences.english: The whole shebang smells sort of fishy to me.
sentences.chinese: 整個事情使我覺得有點蹊蹺。

sentences.english: My mother has sent me a registered letter, I guess she has.
sentences.chinese: 我媽給我發了一封掛號信，我想她有的事情要說。

sentences.english: You know, in one lifetime you can't learn everything that's good.
sentences.chinese: 要知道，人的一生不可能將所有的事情都學得很出色。

sentences.english: Building a concrete Koi pond is a very expensive thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 建設一個具體的錦鯉池是一個非常昂貴的事情。

sentences.english: Would like to have done sht.
sentences.chinese: 希望做而還未做的事情。

sentences.english: The other thing to realize is that all writers think they suck.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個要認識的事情是所有作家認爲他們有所得。

sentences.english: You find it difficult to get things done or even at least get through the day.
sentences.chinese: 你會感覺很難把事情做好，甚至度日如年。

sentences.english: Second, adults should reappraise their priorities about what is important.
sentences.chinese: 其次，成年人應重新評估什麼事情對他們最重要。

sentences.english: Each good thing is hard to begin.
You shouldn't have to do those things, the phone should just work.
sentences.chinese: 你沒必要做那些事情，那是手機本身就應該搞定的。

sentences.english: To narrate is to give an account of what happened or is happening.
sentences.chinese: 記敘文講述的是發生在當前或過去事情的經過。

sentences.english: Lyon claim that Chelsea's attempts to sign midfielder Michael Essien have all but collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 里昂宣稱切爾西試圖簽下中場埃辛的事情以失敗告終。

definition: one's employment/business/matter that needs to be settled/(northern dialect) (of a person) demanding/trying/troublesome/erhua variant of 事[shi4]/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
major event/major political event (war or change of regime)/major social event (wedding or funeral)/(do sth) in a big way/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]
good action, deed, thing or work (also sarcastic, "a fine thing indeed")/charity/happy occasion/Daoist or Buddhist ceremony for the souls of the dead
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc
way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
